rdf:Description.dcterms:creator: mdemeglio
mgarrish
mgylling
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: This RDF vocabulary, a part of NISO Z39.98-2012(http://www.daisy.org/z3998/2012/z3998-2012.html), defines a set of terms relating to the description of structural semantics of documents in general, and written works in particular.
rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Z39.98-2012 Structural Semantics Vocabulary

rdf:Bag.dcterms:title: Major document structures
rdf:Bag.dcterms:description: Standard terms used for the classification, partitioning and dividing of a document.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fiction
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A work of fiction.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: non-fiction
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A work of non-fiction.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: article
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A major independent section in a piece of writing, typically appearing in journals, magazines or newspapers.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: essay
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An essay.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: textbook
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A textbook.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: catalogue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A catalogue.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frontmatter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Preliminary material to the content, such as tables of contents, dedications, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bodymatter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The body content of a document.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: backmatter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ancillary material occurring after the document body, such as indices, appendices, etc..

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: volume
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A component of a collection.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: part
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A major structural division of a piece of writing, typically encapsulating a set of related chapters.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: chapter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A major structural division of a piece of writing.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: subchapter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A major sub-division of a chapter.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: division
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A major structural division that may also appear as a substructure of a part (esp. in legislation).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: section
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A structural division typically subordinate in importance to a part or division (esp. in textbooks and legislation).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: subsection
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A major sub-division of a section.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foreword
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An introductory section that precedes the work, typically not written by the work's author.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: preface
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An introductory section that precedes the work, typically written by the work's author.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prologue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An introductory section that sets the background to a story, typically part of the narrative.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: introduction
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A section in the beginning of the work, typically introducing the reader to the scope or nature of the work's content

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: preamble
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A section in the beginning of the work, typically containing introductory and/or explanatory prose regarding the scope or nature of the work's content

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: conclusion
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An ending section that typically wraps up the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: epilogue
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A concluding section that is typically written from a later point in time than the main story, although still part of the narrative.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: afterword
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An ending section that typically details the history of the story or its significance.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: toc
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A table of contents, typically appearing in the work's frontmatter, or at the beginning of a section.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: appendix
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Supplemental information.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: glossary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An alphabetical list of terms in a particular domain of knowledge with the definitions for those terms.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bibliography
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A list of works cited.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: discography
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A list of albums and/or songs by a performer.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: filmography
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A list of acting roles by a performer.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: index
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A detailed list, usually arranged alphabetically, of the specific information in a publication.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: colophon
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A brief description usually located at the end of a publication, describing production notes relevant to the edition.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: title
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The title of the work, or, when used in the context of a #fulltitle, the primary part of the full title.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: halftitle
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The title appearing that appears on the first page of a work or immediately before the text.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fulltitle
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The full title of the work, either simple, in which case it is identical to #title, or compound, in which case it consists of a #title and a #subtitle.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: subtitle
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An explanatory or alternate title for the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: covertitle
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The title of the work as displayed on the work's cover.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: published-works
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A list of additional works by the author.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: title-page
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The title page of the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: halftitle-page
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The half title page of the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: acknowledgments
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A passage containing acknowledgments to entities involved in the realization of the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: imprint
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Information relating to the publication or distribution of the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: imprimatur
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A formal statement authorizing the publication of the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: loi
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A listing of illustrations included in the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lot
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A listing of tables included in the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: publisher-address
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The publisher's address, which can be abbreviated to city and postal code only.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: publisher-address
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A note from the publisher.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: editorial-note
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An explanation of an editorâ€™s method, or a discussion of variant texts.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: grant-acknowledgment
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes financial assistance towards the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: contributors
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A list of contributors to the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: other-credits
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Acknowledgments of previously published parts of the work, illustration credits, and permission to quote from copyrighted material.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: biographical-note
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A biographical note about the author or authors, here including editors, compilers, and translators).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: translator-note
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An introductory note from the translator(s).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: errata
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Publication errata, in printed works typically a loose sheet inserted by hand; sometimes a bound page.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: promotional-copy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A promotional description of the book, often containing quotations from reviews.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dedication
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An inscription addressed to one or several particular person(s).

rdf:Bag.dcterms:title: Document components
rdf:Bag.dcterms:description: Non-structural components that occur within documents, such as letters, poems, quotations, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pgroup
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A group of interrelated paragraphs.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: example
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A sample, model, illustration or template representative of some aspect of the narrative.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: epigraph
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A quotation at the start of a document or section that typically introduces or sets the theme for what follows.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: annotation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Explanatory information about passages in the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: introductory-note
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An annotation whose purpose is to provide an introductory note.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: commentary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An annotation whose purpose is to provide commentary.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: clarification
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An annotation whose purpose is to provide a clarification.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: correction
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An annotation whose purpose is to provide a correction.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: alteration
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An annotation whose purpose is to indicate an alteration made to the source document, such as the re-arrangement or removal of content.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: presentation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An annotation whose purpose is to describe some aspect of the document layout, such as the formatting of a page or conventions used in rendering the content.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: production
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A temporary annotation not intended as part of the finished document, such as a production note

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: attribution
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An annotation whose purpose is to provide a source or attribution.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: author
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An author of a work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: editor
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An editor of a work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: general-editor
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The general editor of a work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: commentator
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A commentator on a work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: translator
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A translator of a work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: republisher
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A republisher of a work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: structure
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A structural description for a piece of content (e.g., a table structure summary).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: geographic
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A positional location, typically expressed by coordinates.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: postal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A postal or mailing address.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: email
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An email address.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ftp
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A file transfer protocol address.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: http
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A hypertext transfer protocol address.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ip
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An internet protocol address.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: aside
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Secondary or supplementary content.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sidebar
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Secondary or supplementary content, typically formatted as an inset or box.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: practice
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A review exercise or sample.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: notice
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A notification.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: warning
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A warning.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: marginalia
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Marginalia.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: help
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Instructions/advice to the reader on using the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: drama
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A work of fiction intended for performance.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: scene
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A structurally significant segment of a drama.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: stage-direction
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An instruction to an actor or director, included in the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dramatis-personae
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A listing of the roles or characters appearing in the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: persona
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name or identity of an individual role or character appearing in the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: actor
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of the actor who plays a character in the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: role-description
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A description of a character in the work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: speech
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An utterance by a #persona.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A diary.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: diary-entry
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A diary entry.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: figure
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An instance of a figure, which may include a title, caption and credits in addition to an image or table.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: plate
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A figure or image typically printed on a coated unnumbered page.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: gallery
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A section of a document containing more than one image, figure or plate. Gallery pages may be numbered or unnumbered, and on regular or special stock.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: letter
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An instance of a formal, informal or business letter.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sender
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name and address of the sender of a letter.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: recipient
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name and address of the recipient of a letter.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: salutation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An expression of greeting at the start of a letter.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: valediction
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An expression of farewell at the end of a letter.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: postscript
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An additional paragraph or note occurring after a signature in a letter.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: email-message
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An instance of a email message.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: to
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The recipient(s) email address line.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: from
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The sender's email address line.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cc
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The carbon copy email address line.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bcc
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The blind carbon copy email address line.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: subject
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The email subject line.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: collection
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A set of interrelated items.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: orderedlist
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A list where the order of the list's items is significant.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unorderedlist
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A list where the order of the list's items is not significant.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: abbreviations
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A list of abbreviations.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: timeline
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A chronological list of events

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: note
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A footnote or a rearnote, linked from the main text via a note reference

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: footnotes
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A collection of notes appearing at the bottom of a page.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: footnote
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A note appearing at the bottom of a page.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rearnote
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A note appearing in the rear (backmatter) of the work, or at the end of a section.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rearnotes
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A collection of notes appearing at the rear (backmatter) of the work, or at the end of a section.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: verse
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A work typically composed of metered or rhyming lines (as opposed to prose).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: poem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A poem.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: song
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A song.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hymn
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A hymn.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lyrics
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The text of a song.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: text
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A segment of text.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: phrase
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A group of lexical words, comprising a single unit within a sentence.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: keyword
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A key word or phrase.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sentence
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A group of lexical words comprising a lexical sentence.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: topic-sentence
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A phrase or sentence serving as an introductory summary of the containing paragraph.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: concluding-sentence
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A phrase or sentence serving as a concluding summary of the containing paragraph.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: t-form
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An informal second-person pronoun.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: v-form
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A formal second-person pronoun.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: acronym
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An abbreviation formed from initial letters of a name or expression, pronounced as a word.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: initialism
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An abbreviation formed from initial letters of a name or expression, with each letter pronunced separately.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: truncation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An abbreviation formed from the first part of a word.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cardinal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A value indicating quantity.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ordinal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A value indicating rank or position.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ratio
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An expression of the magnitude of two quantities relative to each other.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: percentage
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A value that defines proportionality to a whole, including percent sign if present.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: phone
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A phone number, including area code and international dialing code.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: isbn
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An International Standard Book Number.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: currency
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A currency value, including the denomination indicator.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: postal-code
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A postal or zip code.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: result
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A single value that includes two or more sets of numbers separated by spaces.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fraction
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A single fraction with a numerator and denominator, and without a preceding whole number.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: mixed
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A whole number followed by a fraction with a numerator and denominator.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: decimal
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A single value where the integral number is separated from the fractional value by a decimal point or comma.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: roman
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A single value expressed using roman numerals.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: weight
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A single weight value, including units.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: measure
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A single value of measure, including units.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: coordinate
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A value expressing the location of a point in n-dimensional space, including degree, minute and other indicators if specified.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: range
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A numeric, spatial or temporal range of values, as expressed by the start and end values.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: result
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The outcome of an event, such as a sporting match or vote.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: place
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of a city, state, province, country or other geographic or political entity. .

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nationality
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of a nationality, national group, or other designator of association. .

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: organization
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of an organization, corporation, or other business entity. .

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: taxonomy
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of a species, genus or other taxonomic classification. .

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: product
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The brand name of a product, medication, etc. .

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: event
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of a religious, sporting, or other event, holiday or festival. .

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: award
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of an award or prize. .

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: personal-name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A proper name identifying a person, often composed of a given name and a family name.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: given-name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The part of a personal name that distinguishes the person from a group of persons sharing the same surname. Also known as 'forename' or 'first name'. .

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: surname
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The part of a personal name that associates the person with a group of persons sharing the same surname. Also known as 'last name'.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: family-name
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The part of a personal name that indicates the family to which the person belongs. Often used in conjunction with a honorific.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: name-title
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The part of a personal name that signifies veneration, an official position or a professional or academic qualification. .

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: signature
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The handwritten, digital or stamped representation of a person's name.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: word
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A lexical word.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: compound
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A word created by the combination of two or more stems.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: homograph
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An instance of a set of words with the same spelling but different etymologies and often pronunciations (e.g. bass the instrument and bass the fish).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: portmanteau
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A word created from the merging of two other words (e.g. brunch from breakfast and lunch).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: root
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The primary lexical unit of a word.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: stem
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The word form common to all its inflected variants.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prefix
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An affix attached to the front of a stem.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: suffix
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An affix attached to the end of a stem.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: morpheme
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The smallest linguistic unit of a word with semantic meaning.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: phoneme
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The smallest linguistic unit of a word that forms a sound.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: grapheme
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The smallest linguistic unit of a written word.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: illustration
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An illustration.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: photograph
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A photograph.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: decorative
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Artwork serving only a decorative purpose, not contributing relevant information.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: publisher-logo
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The publisher's logo.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frontispiece
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A frontmatter illustration.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: reference
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference to another information entity - a resource, fragment, concept, or notion.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: resolving-reference
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference which contains data intended to allow resolving the target entity.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nonresolving-reference
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference to a non-resolving target - a concept, notion or other imprecisely defined entity.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: noteref
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference to a note, typically appearing a superscripted symbol in the main body of text

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: annoref
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference to an annotation

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: citation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference to bibliographic work, resolving to an entry in a directly or indirectly identified bibliography

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nonresolving-citation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An imprecise reference to a bibliographic work.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: continuation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference to another segment of the current work that constitutes the logical continuation of the current segment.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: continuation-of
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference to another segment of the current work that the current segment is a continuation of.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pagebreak
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A (sometimes valued) separator denoting the position where a break between two contiguous pages occurs in a paginated media.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: page-header
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Material, separate from the main body of text, appearing at the top of a printed page.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: page-footer
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Material, separate from the main body of text, appearing at the bottom of a printed page.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: recto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The front side of a page.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: verso
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The back side of a page.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: image-placeholder
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A placeholder for a reference to a non-existing or deliberately removed image.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: primary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the current element has primary importance (for example, may identify the primary table of contents for a work or a primary source).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: secondary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the current element has secondary importance.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: tertiary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the current element has tertiary importance.
